title: Bridging the gap: Can the chasers catch back in this two-tier Tour de France?
content:
'Like Cipollini climbing with Pantani': Vingegaard and Pogačar are more dominant than anyone expected – but the peloton vows to battle on.

Read the full article at Bridging the gap: Can the chasers catch back in this two-tier Tour de France? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
